data.oai_dc:dc: The water management was classified into four soil water matric potential mean: -15 kPa (Wet), -25 kPa (Optimal), -30 kPa (Dry) and -45 kPa (Very Dry). The three potato cultivars used were Goldrush (most cultivated mid-season variety in Quebec), Envol (popular early variety), and Red Maria (mid-late to late variety).|50,925 occurrences
